Afghanistan? Never heard of it.

Feb 14, 2003

It is bad enough that the Kurds are getting the shaft in the war on Iraq, but if I were a member of the Iraqi opposition I would be worried, very worried. It seems that the Bush administration clean forgot to include money promised to Afghanistan in their last budget! That’s right – they forgot to ask for any of the $300 million dollars they had promised to give Afghanistan. They provided no reason for this oversight. Fortunately, it seems that congress has managed to come up with the money anyway. But how come only the BBC seems to have bothered to report this incredible gaff? Where is the Liberal Media when you need it?
